title: Welcome to Reed Square!
posting_body: Modern design and rustic elements combine to create a comfortable, inviting, and stylish home at Reed Square apartments in Sunnyvale, CA
Are you looking for a spacious 2 bed/2 bath home with stunning, stainless steel appliances?
Including an in-home washer and dryer?
If so, Reed Square has what you're looking for!
Our pet-friendly community features park-like landscaping and a pet spa to keep your four-legged friend fresh and clean.
You can relax by our pool, host friends in our BBQ and picnic areas, or work out in our fitness center.
Our community is situated in the prestigious Santa Clara/Sunnyvale School District and surrounded by many parks, trails, and exciting attractions.
Head to downtown Sunnyvale for shopping and dining or hop on the Lawrence Expressway or nearby Caltrain for quick access to the rest of Silicon Valley.
Pricing and availability are subject to change without notice
